scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run copy:vendor && npx browserify build/index.js -o build/bundle.js
scripts.clean: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:dist
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run download && npm run copy:package.json && npm run copy:public && npm run copy:bundle && npm run copy:server
scripts.download: npm run mkdirs && cd dist/public && node -e "fs.existsSync('scrcpy-server.jar')||require('node-wget')('https://github.com/drauggres/scrcpy/releases/download/v1.8.1/scrcpy-server.jar')"
scripts.copy:package.json: node -e "const j=require('./package.json');const {name,version,description,author,license,dependencies,scripts}=j; const p={name, version, description,author,license,dependencies}; p.scripts={start: scripts['dist:start']};fs.writeFileSync('./dist/package.json', JSON.stringify(p, null, '  '))"
scripts.start: npm run dist && npm run start:dist
